title: VyBeen
short: Listen and sing music together, thanks to VyBeen!
description: VyBeen is a web platform to listen and sing music together.
It's a project I made to listen to music with friends, and i upgrade it sometimes to add new features.
This project is far from being finished, but it's already usable, so don't hesitate to try it (link below) !
You can also check the source code on GitHub to see how it works, and maybe contribute to it if you want to.
